text: Excellent customer service by Nicholas Ong, was attended by him on 21 August 2019, around 3pm. A young and very patient guy, explained all the fine details and advice on the better plan that’s more suitable for me. I signed up for 2 additional lines. Pleasant transaction. Very friendly and helpful guy. Very rare to encounter someone who’s helpful in the telecommunications services. Thanks for brighten up my day. Cheers
Ridiculous waiting time. Recieved SMS at 7:05 that there is 1 customer ahead of me. Waited till 7:45 with no end in sight as I am writing this. ATROCIOUS!!
Just found out my parents are paying $300 a month for phone bills loaded with a bunch of stuff they don't need, and accessories they don't understand nor use.

Had a disappointing experience today after my visit...
Found out the phone I had purchased has motherboard issues (Samsung A52) After talking it back I was promptly sent away to Samsung. I asked the resentative if I can purchase a wireless charger, and whether it is compatible with my phone which he responded to with "yes"  Only after I test it (which was not allowed in the store), now I find out I need another wireless adaptor to use the wireless charger... I'm quite disappointed with the staff knowledge.
The customer service guy is extremely rude. 0 etiquette on how to treat customer
